thread.title: Masked man attacks people with bow and arrow, says he's looking for drug dealers
thread.title_full: WTF | Masked man attacks people with bow and arrow, says he's looking for drug dealers - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Masked man attacks people with bow and arrow, says he's looking for drug dealers
text:
You'd be forgiven for thinking this sounds like something from CW's Arrow.
A masked man is attacking people in Nanticoke, Pennsylvania with a bow and arrow and has already speared a 15-year old boy in front of his house.
According to the boy, the masked man approached him and asked him where the drugs were. When the boy responded that he didn't know, the man hit him with an arrow.
There's already been a second attack in as many days in the same area. Police have said they're investigating the attacks and have recovered an arrow from the scene.
While it all might sound hilarious, residents are worried. "I mean I've heard gunshots, I've heard paintballs, ice, everything. An arrow is just weird," said Tara Karlowicz of Nanticoke.
Who knows? Maybe it's because all those people failed this city.
ARROW REFERENCE, YEAH.
Via WNEP.com
